amenities.name: Breakfast
amenities.description: We offer a wide variety of your favorite breakfast foods. From eggs and sausage to muffins and smoothies, we've got you covered.

amenities.name: Exercise/workout room
amenities.description: Each of our hotels is decked out with plenty of excersize equipment. We have weights, yogo equipment, exercise machines, and more.

amenities.name: Indoor pool
amenities.description: If you like swimming then we've got you covered. Each of our hotels has a heated 15 feet by 36 feet pool with a depth ranging from 3 feet at the shallow end to 6 feet at the deep end.

amenities.name: WiFi high-speed internet access and smart TVs
amenities.description: Our high-speed wifi comes free with purchase. Each room is equiped with a 65‚Äù flatscreen smart tv. Access to Netflix, BYU-TV, and Disney plus are included with purchase.

amenities.name: Parking
amenities.description: Our parking lot is complete with one reserved parking spot per room, and optional valet parking. Additional parking may be reserved for an extra fee.

amenities.name: Temple shuttle
amenities.description: Our temple shuttle runs on the half-hour. We pick you up at the front of the hotel and drop you off right at the temple doors.

amenities.name: Family history consultation and family ordinance card service
amenities.description: Each hotel includes a family history library where family history consultants are stationed from 9am to 5pm.
